name: Speech Separation
points: Built a pipeline that can create noisy data by mixing various noise signals with speech signals to generate a noisy audio signal.
Converted these noisy speech signals into visual data by converting them into spectrogram which can be used to train the model.
Built a Convolutional Variational AutoEncoder to separate speech signal from noisy audio signal.

name: Urban Sound Classification
points: Visualized the audio signals using spectrogram and perform pattern analysis to identify various noise signal
Created a Convolutional Neural Network that can be used to classify the spectrograms of these noises.

name: Iris Recognition.
points: Using daughman's formula, we were able to identify the concentric circles in the eye.
The image section in these concentric circles are fed into a preprocessing pipeline that will flatten the section and mask it so that we can store it in a database
Algorithms like cosine similarity is used to find the closest iris to identify it from the database.

name: Support Ticketing System
points: Built a full stack web application to provide support for students
This webapp can take full advantage of advanced filtering such as tags, search bar etc.
